title: Pity
occurrences: The expression that people adopt when they feel pity for someone
I hope that the pity the defendant asks of you will not become the grounds
If your heart tells you to take pity on this killer,
just think of who will take pity on you,
'Tis a pity that you died, While we are still among the living.
'Tis a pity that you died, While we are still among the living.
It is a pity you left us so early.
And it is an even greater pity, you had to leave us in such a cruel way.
I mean, it would be a pity if you brought the cake just after I left.
